message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us at $1,500,000. Considering its worth and the potential it can bring to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a strategic price of $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing the value for both parties involved. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and interests.
